original_text: In the second month on the fourteenth day at twilight they shall keep it. They shall eat it with unleavened bread and bitter herbs.
korean_text: 둘째 달 열넷째 날 해 질 때에 그것을 지켜서 어린 양에 무교병과 쓴 나물을 아울러 먹을 것이요

sentences.original_text: In the second month on the fourteenth day at twilight
sentences.korean_translation: 두째 달 열나흗날 해 질 때에

sentences.original_text: with unleavened bread and bitter herbs.
sentences.korean_translation: 누룩 없는 떡과 쓴 나물과 함께.
